prompt.purpose: Identify possible root causes of a problem using a fishbone diagram.
prompt.context: Ask for the main effect statement if it is not provided.
prompt.instructions:
1. Generate a text-based fishbone with six categories: Methods, Machines, People, Materials, Environment and Measurement.
1. Under each category, list two concise possible causes.
1. End with a 30-word note on which cause to probe first and why.
prompt.inputs: - `{{problem}}`: main effect statement describing the problem.
prompt.output_format: Bullet list or table representing the fishbone followed by the investigation note.
prompt.additional_notes: Limit the entire reply to 120 words.
